FuncDef: This command sets the identifier attached to routes the VPN belongs to. Each routing instance must have a unique (within the carrier s domain) route distinguisher associated with it. A route distinguisher must be defined for a VPRN to be operationally active.

ParaDef.Info: The route distinguisher is a 6-byte value that can be specified in one of the following formats:.
Specifies the IP address in dotted decimal notation. The assigned number must not be greater than 65535.
The ASN is a 2-byte value less than or equal to 65535. The assigned number can be any 32-bit unsigned integer value.
The system will generate an RD for the service according to the IP address and range configured in the bgp-auto-rd-range command.
